comments.author: Dr Ishmael.9685
comments.body:
Posted a PSA on reddit, EU people definitely need to know about this.

http://www.reddit.com/r/Guildwars2/comments/1n42q3/psa_eu_event_status_updates_now_stable_in_api/

comments.author: AdelphiA.9287
comments.body: Yup thanks. May I ask if possible to put a post if you’re going to do something like that then hopefully you won’t get any grumpy posts (from me included).

comments.author: Terrasque.8735
comments.body:
Thanks, man

Glad to see you’re improving things. Good job!

comments.author: Stefan Larimore.6872
comments.body:
Hi All, I’ve just deployed the “missing event update” fix. There was an unexpected problem which caused some downtime while I got this deployed. It should be updating correctly from now on and the EU event updates problem should be gone for good.

Sorry for the disruption.

comments.author: Terrasque.8735
comments.body:
Khisanth.2948:

Are you looking at EU, NA or both?

Both, actually. Seems like it started working 21:19 cest, then stopped working again 21:24 – and is still not updating

Edit: And started again 21:41

comments.author: Kioshi.6597
comments.body: There seem to be update problems on the EU servers again. Yesterday the fire-elemental 5 min times was on -55 mins. And now it claim Modniir is up for 1 hour too, but nothing.
